markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 3" pfs="Standard">
[Dirge of Doom](/Spells.aspx?ID=1764)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 370 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

Enemies within the area are [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19). They can't reduce their frightened value below 1 while they remain in the area.
name: Dirge of Doom
